name: Cabeça de Cuia
description:
The legend of Cabeça de Cuia is the story of Crispim, a young boy who lived on the banks of the Parnaíba River and from a very poor family.

Legend has it that one day, when he arrived for lunch, his mother served him, as usual, a thin soup with bones, as his house often lacked meat.

That day he rebelled, and in the middle of the argument with his mother, he threw the bone at her, hitting her in the head and killing her. Before he died his mother cursed him to be wandering in the river and with his huge head in the shape of a gourd, which would wander day and night and would only be freed from the curse after devouring seven virgins, named Maria. <Crypto Legends | A Series by Renancio Monte | 2021>
